name: df-ascl
body: |- wceq(cascl, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), co(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(s0)), cfv(cur, cv(s0))))))
comment: Every unital algebra contains a canonical homomorphic image of its ring of scalars as scalar multiples of the unit. This names the homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Mar-2015.)
